mapper.select: SELECT ORG_ID ,ORG_NM FROM BMS_ORG_MST WHERE ORG_DIV = 'OD008'

SELECT A.FCLT_ID ,A.MAKER ,A.FCLT_KIND ,A.CLSFCTN_ID ,A.INST_LOC ,A.MODEL_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.BUY_DT, '%Y%m%d') BUY_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(A.INST_DT, '%Y%m%d') INST_DT ,A.FCLT_COORDS ,A.USE_YN ,A.CTR_YN ,A.REMARK ,A.NODE_ID ,A.MNG_ID ,A.FCLT_IP ,B.CLSFCTN_NM FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_EMER_CLSFCTN_MST B ON A.CLSFCTN_ID = B.CLSFCTN_ID WHERE A.NODE_ID = #{NODE_ID}

SELECT NODE_ID ,FCLT_ID ,FCLT_KIND ,PARAM_DIV ,PARAM_KIND ,FCLT_KIND AS OLD_FCLT_KIND ,PARAM_DIV AS OLD_PARAM_DIV ,PARAM_KIND AS OLD_PARAM_KIND ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LENGTH ,DATA_VAL ,ATTR1_VAL ,ATTR2_VAL ,SCHEDULE_YN ,USE_YN ,AUTO_YN ,REMARK FROM BMS_FCLT_PARAM_INFO
WHERE NODE_ID = #{NODE_ID} AND FCLT_ID = #{FCLT_ID}

SELECT SN ,FCLT_KIND ,PARAM_DIV ,PARAM_KIND ,ST_TIME ,ED_TIME ,DATA_VAL ,REMARK ,DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DTM ,UPD_ID FROM BMS_FCLT_SCH_INFO WHERE FCLT_KIND = #{FCLT_KIND} AND PARAM_DIV = #{PARAM_DIV} AND PARAM_KIND = #{PARAM_KIND} ORDER BY SN

SELECT FCLT_KIND ,PARAM_DIV ,PARAM_KIND ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LENGTH ,DATA_VAL ,ATTR1_VAL ,ATTR2_VAL ,SCHEDULE_YN ,USE_YN ,AUTO_YN ,REMARK ,DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DTM ,UPD_ID FROM BMS_FCLT_PARAM_CFG_INFO
FCLT_KIND = #{FCLT_KIND} AND (PARAM_DIV, PARAM_KIND) NOT IN ( SELECT PARAM_DIV, PARAM_KIND FROM BMS_FCLT_PARAM_INFO WHERE FCLT_KIND = #{FCLT_KIND} AND FCLT_ID = #{FCLT_ID} )
AND (FCLT_KIND LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || PARAM_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND FCLT_KIND LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND PARAM_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY FCLT_KIND
